name: Juho Kujala
description: Easily the best experience with a photographer to date! Ashik is super personable and very talented at his craft. He made sure everyone was comfortable and enjoying the experience. Thanks Ashik!

name: Thijme Proper
description: I am so glad that I stumbled across Ashik Photography. I can’t say enough about how professional Ashik is and the quality of work that he provides. I was so pleased with my session and final photographs, that I will continue to use him in the future

name: Primo Nogueira
description: Ashik is a wonderful man and truly a professional in his field. He was instantly able to put my family at ease, and capture some captivating photographs. I will treasure them forever. I simply cannot recommend him enough!

name: June Fossli
description: Ashik was the best photographer I have ever hired. On time. Followed through on everything he said he would do. Would highly recommend him to family, friends and business associates

name: Tracey Campbell
description: Great photographer to work with. Ashik was energetic, engaging, and a lot of fun! We love our wedding pictures!

name: Amy Warren
description: Ashik is super creative and is genuinely a nice guy. Great to work with!

name: Victoria Prieto
description: Ashik is an extremely personable individual, with an artistic eye, he will make your experience memorable!!

name: Nalan Taşçı
description: Ashik has an amazing eye and is so easy to work with. Don’t pass up the chance to work with him!

name: Joel Maunu
description: There just aren’t enough words to possibly describe how amazing each and every photo that taryn snaps. She has a magical way of finding the perfect angle, lighting and of course expressions.

name: Eline Moulin
description: Ashik creates magic. She has captured the most special moments of my family’s life. I would never hesitate to recommend her to anyone who wants a true professional to create a customized photography experience.
